mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT `id`,`menu_name`,`parent_id`,`order_num`, `path`,`component`,`menu_type`,`visible`, `status`,`perms`,`icon`,`create_time` FROM `sys_menu` WHERE `status` = 0 AND `del_flag` = 0 AND `menu_type` IN ('C','M') ORDER BY `parent_id`,`order_num`

SELECT DISTINCT `id`,`menu_name`,`parent_id`,`order_num`, `path`,`component`,`menu_type`,`visible`, `status`,`perms`,`icon`,`create_time` FROM `sys_menu` WHERE `status` = 0 AND `del_flag` = 0 AND `menu_type` IN ('C','M') AND `id` IN ( SELECT DISTINCT `menu_id` FROM `sys_role_menu` WHERE `role_id` IN ( SELECT DISTINCT `role_id` FROM `sys_user_role` WHERE `user_id` = #{userId} ) ) ORDER BY `parent_id`,`order_num`
